Loading, please wait... //Login Screen Connecting people across world Access ID Password I Accept Terms and Conditions Login If you\'re facing any problem, feel free to Contact Us Please accept terms and condition to continue Empty access id and password Wrong access id and password Access ID cannot be greater than 10 digits Password cannot be smaller than 6 digits This user is already logged in on a different device Login failed //Dashboard Screen FAQ Change Language History Help-Center Share Logout Time EXPIRED DAY Date Conference Room Name Upcoming Ongoing All Slide left/right to view other Select Conference Room Expired Reminder already added No calendars found. Please ensure at least one google account has been added. Error adding reminder No calendar account selected Refresh Failed. Try again. Select a calendar account //FAQ Screen FAQ\'s Expand All Collapse All What is K Lite? K Lite is a Virtual Interaction tool that makes it possible for you to connect with your consumers, wherever they might be, instantaneously over a Video Call What is the process of using this application? Once the app is installed from play store, you need to enter your credentials and log-in. You then need to join the respective scheduled meeting. Is K Lite available on iOS, Android or Web? Yes, it is available all the platforms. Country where does K Lite support? K Lite is available across the globe What are the minimum requirements to use K Lite APP? You need to have smart phone with 3G /4G network connection. For Android, it should be at least 4.4 Kitkat OS. For iOS, it should be greater than 10. For Web, it should be supporting the latest version of Chrome, Firefox or Safari. I haven’t received my logging-in credentials yet. What should I do? Please reach out to K Lite Help Desk for assistance. How will I get to know when a new meeting is scheduled for me? You will get a notification on your app as well as an e-mail from Team K Lite. I am facing problems with signing-in. Please suggest the way ahead. You should contact the Help Desk. What should I do when the video is not audible? Earphone/ Helpdesk We recommend using the earphones. If the issue is still not resolved, please contact the Help Desk. The quality of audio/video is not good. What should I do? Please check your internet connection. It is possibly an internet issue. I have mistakenly dropped out of the meeting. Please let me know, how do I re-join. You need to go back to your meeting screen and re-join the call. My chat messages are not getting delivered. What should be done? Please check your internet connection. It is possibly an internet issue. I am not able to view the image/video shared by the moderator. What should I do? Please check your internet connection. It is possibly an internet issue. I haven’t received my logging-in credentials yet. What should I do? Please reach out to K Lite Help Desk for assistance. //Conference Details Fragment Respondent Details Age SEC Gender User Key Instructions: Kenante works on Android Kitkat and above, iOS 11 and above, Chrome 74 and above Please be at a place with Braodband Internet connection or 4G Mobile connection with Internet speeds of 5 mbps or above Earphones are recommended for the call. Please position yourself in front of your Mobile or Desktop/ Laptop so that you are facing the light. This will ensure clear Video of your face for the others to see and interact Ensure battery is sufficiently charged before the call. We recommend charge of at least 60% Join //Call Screen No users present to chat First close screen sharing Wired headset plugged in Connecting your call Rejoining you to call. This may take around 30 seconds. Closing call... //Full Chat Screen No Chat with this user //Setup Call With Link Screen //Incoming Call Screen You have cut this call. To join conference session kindly start it clicking the green button on top. //Change Language Screen //Others Facing Issue Write your problem Unsupported Format You need to grant all these permissions to continue. To continue you need to allow recording permission Video finished Error occurred While Playing Video Cancel Okay Yes No Terms and Conditions Attended Starting call. Please wait... moderator respondent translator client admin T recorder No Internet access... Please check internet settings No groups exist Add Group Enter text Please wait! None of the members have joined the conference yet. Users on call Brief Brief Request Can\'t upload this file. //NOT TO BE INCLUDED IN TRANSLATIONS //App Name Open Navigation Drawer Close Navigation Drawer "Download our app Vaarta by clicking on the following links\n\nOn Android:\n\nhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=vcims.com.klite \n\nOn iOS:\n\nhttps://apps.apple.com/in/app/klite/id1506370978?ls=1&mt=8 " 763222478253 Camera Switch Failed

K Liteé: Terms and Condition

This document is an electronic record in terms of Information Technology Act, 2000 and rules there under applicable and the amended provisions pertaining to electronic records in various statutes as amended by the Information Technology Act, 2000. This electronic record is generated by a computer system and does not require any physical or digital signatures.

This document is published in accordance with the provision Technology (Intermediaries guidelines) Rules and regulations, privacy policy and Terms of Use for access or usage of K Liteé mobile phone application for android, IOS operating and also available on Web.

The K Liteé Application by Varenia Consumer Insights and Measurement Solutions Private Limited (hereinafter referred to as Varenia CIMS) is under license. Varenia CIMS is a company incorporated under the Companies Act, 2013, India. In these terms of use, K Liteé may refer to website/ web based application, mobile phone application.

K Liteé

Your use of K Liteé and its associated services and tools are governed by the following terms and conditions (Terms of Use) as applicable to K Liteé including the applicable policies which are incorporated herein by way of reference. If you shall be subject to the policies that are applicable to K Liteé for such transaction. By mere use of K Liteé, you shall be contracting with VARENIA CIMS Pvt. Ltd. and these terms and conditions (including the policies) constitute your binding obligations, with VARENIA CIMS Pvt. Ltd.

 

Website and mobile phone application for Android and iOS operating systems Terms of Use

 

These terms and conditions of use (Terms of Use) of K Liteé (as defined below) between K Liteé and the users/ registrants of K Liteé (You or Your or Yourself or User) describe the terms on which K Liteé offers You access to K Liteé and the Services (as defined below) through K Liteé.

 

PLEASE READ THE TERMS OF USE CAREFULLY BEFORE USING OR REGISTERING ON K Liteé OR ACCESSING ANY MATERIAL, INFORMATION OR SERVICES THROUGH K Liteé. YOUR USE OF K Liteé OR THE SERVICES PROVIDED BY K Liteé SHALL SIGNIFY YOUR ACCEPTANCE OF THE TERMS OF USE AND YOUR AGREEMENT TO BE LEGALLY BOUND BY THE SAME.

YOUR USE OF K Liteé IMPLIES THAT YOU AGREE WITH THE TERMS OF USE.

  1. General

1.1 Use of K Liteé is offered to you conditioned on acceptance of all the terms, conditions and notices contained in these Terms, along with any amendments made by K Liteé at its sole discretion and posted on K Liteé, including by way of imposing an additional charge for access to or use of a Service.

1.2 K Liteé shall not be required to notify you, whether as a registered user or not, of any changes made to the Terms of Use. The revised Terms of Use shall be made available on K Liteé. Your use of K Liteé and the Services is Subject to the most current version of the terms of Use made available on K Liteé at the time of such use. You are requested to regularly visit the home page in the K Liteé Mobile app to view the most current Terms of Use. You can determine when K Liteé last modified the Terms of Use by referring to the last Updated legend above. It shall be your responsibility to check these Terms of Use periodically for changes. K Liteé may require You to provide Your consent to the updated Terms of Use in a specified manner prior to any further use of K Liteé and the Services provided on K Liteé. If no such separate consent is sought, your continued use of K Liteé, following changes to the terms of Use, will constitute Your acceptance of those changes.

 

1.3 By (i) using this website or mobile phone application for Android and iOS operating system in any way; or (ii) merely browsing K Liteé, or downloading mobile phone application for Android and iOS operating system on your mobile phone handset, you agree that you have read, understood and agreed to be bound by these Terms of Use and K Liteé Privacy Policy available at the homepage,

 

2 Services

2.1 K Liteé is a platform that facilitates the user to choose to enter into a contest/ contest program and upon answering completely, become eligible for special points, discount coupons and/or offers

 

3 Eligibility to Use

3.1 The services are not available to minors under the age of Fifteen (15) or to any Users suspended or removed from the K Liteé system by K Liteé or Varenia CIMS for any reason whatsoever. If You do not conform to the above qualification, You shall not be permitted to avail of the Services or use K Liteé. You represent that You are of legal age to form a binding contract and are not a person barred from receiving services under the law as applicable in India.

Notwithstanding the foregoing, if you are below the age of Fifteen (15) years, You may avail the Services provided by K Liteé through Your legal guardian in accordance with the applicable laws provided the user has his own mobile

3.2 K Liteé reserves the right to refuse access to use the Services offered at K Liteé to new Users or to terminate access granted to existing Users at any time without according any reasons for doing so.

3.3 The user registration is based on the concept of ONE USER ONE MOBILE NUMBER Concept and therefore, User can register only one name with one mobile number.

In case a new user registers on the same mobile phone, the previous user will no longer be deemed as the user on that mobile. In case the user has switched mobile numbers, they need to update their profile via Application/ Website or register again as a new user. Any benefits accrued to user in the old registered to the new account.

 

  1. User Account, Password, and Security

4.1 K Liteé makes the service available to you through K Liteé application for Android and iOS operating systems only if you have provided K Liteé certain required User information and created an account (Account) through K Liteé iD and password or log-in ID and password, which may include a Facebook, Gmail, Yahoo ID or any other valid email ID (collectively, the Account Information). The Services may also be subject to procedures for use of K Liteé Website/web app or mobile phone application for Android and iOS operating systems, Terms of Offer for Sales/Use, uploaded guidelines, rules, additional terms of service, or other disclaimer and notices, if any (Additional Terms). If there is any conflict between the Terms of Use and the Additional Terms shall take precedence in relation to that service.

4.2 K Liteé requires You to register as a User by creating an Account in order to avail of the Services provided by K Liteé. You will be responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of Account Information, and are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your Account. You agree to (a) immediately notify K Liteé of any unauthorized use of your Account Information or any other breach of security, and (b) ensure that You exit from Your Account at the end of each session. K Liteé cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from Your failure to comply with this Section 4.2 You may be held liable for losses incurred by K Liteé or any other user of or visitor to K Liteé due to authorized or unauthorized use of your Account as a result of your failure in keeping Your Account Information secured and confidential.

4.3 K Liteé also allows restricted access to the Services for unregistered users.

4.4 You shall ensure that the Account Information provided by you in K Liteé registration form is complete accurate and up to date. Users of another user Account Information for availing the services is expressly prohibited.

4.5 If you provide any information that is untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete (or becomes untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete), or K Liteé has reasonable grounds to suspect that such information is untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete, K Liteé has the right to suspend or terminate your account and refuse any and all current or future use of K Liteé (or any portion thereof)

4.6 Any personally identifiable data (which includes Phone number, email ID and Address) of the user will not be shared with any third party by K Liteé, but aggregated data (without the personally identifiable information) can be shared with other third party. The data based on contest done by various users would be collected in aggregate form which may be age wise, gender wise, city wise or as the case may be and in aggregate form. Subject to any force majeure event, in no circumstances, K Liteé would release personally identifiable information of the individual users to other companies without prior permission from the said user.

 

5 Offers / Discount

Information

 

5.1 K Liteé shall be under no liability whatsoever in respect of any loss or damage arising directly or indirectly out of the decline of redemption of points/ discount coupons/ offers by the merchandise/ service providers, on account of any reason whatsoever. This shall remain a matter to be resolved between the parties carrying out the transaction(s).

6.1 Subject to compliance with the Terms of Use, K Liteé grants you a non-exclusive, limited privilege to access and use this website and/ or mobile phone application for android and IOS operating systems and the Services therein.

6.2 You agree to use the Services, Website or mobile phone application for android and iOS operating systems and the materials provided therein only for purposes that are permitted by : (a) the terms of Use and (b) any applicable law, regulation or generally accepted practices or guidelines in the relevant jurisdictions.

6.4 You agree not to access (or attempt to access) K Liteé and the materials or Services by any means other than through the interface that is provided by K Liteé. You shall not use any deep-link, robot, spider or other automatic device, program, algorithm or methodology, or any similar or equivalent manual process, to access, acquire, copy or monitor any portion of K Liteé or content (as defined below), or in any way reproduce or circumvent the navigational structure or presentation of K Liteé, materials or any content, to obtain any materials, documents or information through any means not specifically made available through K Liteé.

K Liteé disclaimed all liabilities arising in relation to such offensive content on K Liteé. Further, you may report such offensive content in the manner prescribed under section 17 herein.

 7.1 Except as expressly indicated to the contrary in any applicable additional terms, K Liteé hereby grants you a non-exclusive, freely revocable (upon notice from K Liteé), non-transferable access to view, download and print product catalogues or any other materials available on K Liteé, subject to the following conditions:

 10 Third Party Content

 K Liteé makes available general third party information such as, product catalogues, lists of authorized dealers, and reports on news, entertainment, technology and features, advertisements including videos, images and photographs of the products and other data from external sources (third party content). Similar third party content may also be available to you on any email or other communication received by you from K Liteé. 11 Disclaimer Of Warranties and Liability

YOU EXPRESSLY UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT, TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW:

 

11.1 K Liteé, SERVICES AND OTHER MATERIALS ARE PROVIDED BY K Liteé ON AN AS IS BASIS WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS, IMPLIED, STATUTORY OR OTHERWISE, INCLUDING THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF TITLE, NON INFRINGRMRNT, MARCHANTABILTY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. 12 Indemnification and Limitation of Liability

12.1 You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless K Liteé including but not limited to its affiliate vendors, agents and employees from and against any and all losses, liabilities, claims, damages, demands, costs and expenses (including legal fees and disbursements in connection therewith and interest chargeable thereon) asserted against or incurred by K Liteé that arise out of, result form, or may be payable by virtue of any representation, warranty, covenant or agreement made or obligation to be performed by you pursuant to these terms of use. Further, you agree to hold K Liteé harmless against any claims made by any third party due to, or arising out of, or in connection with, your use of K Liteé, any claim that your material caused damage to a third party, your violation of the terms of use, or your violation of any rights of another, including any intellectual property rights.

13 Violation of the terms of use

13.1 You agree that K Liteé may, in its sole discretion and without prior notice, terminate your access to K Liteé and block your future access to K Liteé if K Liteé determines that you have violated these terms of use or additional terms. 14 Termination

14.1 The terms of use will continue to apply until terminated by either you or K Liteé as set forth below. If you want to terminate your agreement with K Liteé, you may do so by (i) not accessing K Liteé for twelve months; or (ii) closing your accounts for all of the services that you use, where K Liteé has made this option available to you.

 

14.4 K Liteé may, at any time, with or without notice, terminate the terms of use with you (or portion thereof, such as any individual Additional Terms) and forfeit the points balance in your account if:

You breach any of the provisions of the terms of use, the privacy policy or any other terms, conditions, or policies that may be applicable to you from time to time (or have acted in a manner that clearly shows that you do not intend to, or are unable to, comply with the same)

K Liteé is required to do so by law (for example, where the provision of the service to you is, or becomes, unlaw); or

K Liteé has elected to discontinue, with or without reason, access to K Liteé, the services (or any part thereof); or

The provision of the services to you by K Liteé is, in K Liteé opinion, no longer commercially viable;

14.3 K Liteé may also terminate or suspend all or a portion of your account or access to the services with or without reason. Expect as may be set forth in any additional terms applicable to a particular service, termination of your account may include: (i) removal of access to all offerings within K Liteé or with respect to the services: (ii) deletion of your materials and account information, including your personal information, log in ID and password, and all in ID and password, and all related information, files and materials associated with or inside your account (or any part therefore); and (iii) baring of further use of the services.

14.4 You agree that all terminations shall be made in K Liteé sole discretions and that K Liteé shall not be liable to you or any third party for any termination of your account(and accompanying deletion of your account information), or your access to K Liteé and services.

14.5 Notwithstanding the foregoing, these terms of use will survive indefinitely unless and until K Liteé chooses to to terminate them.

14.6 If you or K Liteé terminates your use of K Liteé , K Liteé may delete any content or other materials relating to your use of K Liteé and K Liteé will have no liability to you or any third party for doing so.

 

15 Governing Law

You agree that all claims, differences and disputes arising under or in connection with or in relation hereto K Liteé , the terms of use or any transactions entered into on or through K Liteé or the relationship between you and K Liteé shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts at New Delhi, India and you hereby accede to and accept the jurisdiction of such courts.

 

16 Report Abuse

In the event you come across any abuse or violation of these terms of use or if you become aware of any objectionable content on K Liteé, please report to K Liteé Customer Support.

Privacy Policy

17 Privacy Policy

The user hereby consents, expresses and agrees that he has read and fully understands the privacy policy of K Liteé in respect of K Liteé. You further consent that the terms and contents of such privacy policy are acceptable to you.

 

18 Communications

18.1 You hereby expressly agree to receive communications by way of SMS, e-mails, newsletters and any other appropriate communication media from K Liteé relating to Services provided through K Liteé.

18.2 User can unsubscribe/ opt-out from receiving communications from K Liteé by sending feedback to us via K Liteé mobile application or website or by contacting us via email requesting the same.

 

19 General Provisions

19.1 Notice : All notices of K Liteé will be served by email or by general notification on K Liteé application or website. Any notice provided to K Liteé pursuant to the terms of use should be sent to K Liteé contact details provided on application/ website.

19.2 Assignment : You cannot assign or otherwise transfer the terms of use, or any rights granted hereunder any third party . K Liteé rights under the terms of use are freely transferable by K Liteé to any third parties without the requirement of seeking your consent.

19.3 Severability : If for any reason, a court of competent jurisdiction finds any provision of the terms of use, or portion thereof, to be unenforceable, that provision shall be enforced to the maximum extent permissible so as to give effect to the intent of the parties as reflected by that provision, and the reminder of the terms of use shall continue in full force and effect.

 

19.4 Waiver : Any failure by K Liteé to enforce or exercise any provisions of the terms of use, or any related right, shall not constitute a waiver by K Liteé of that provision or right.

 

20 Feedback and Information

Any feedback you provide to this website or mobile Application for any android or iOS operating systems shall be free to use such information on an unrestricted basis. Further, by submitting the feedback, you represent and warrant that (i) your feedback does not contain confidential or proprietary information of you or of third parties (ii) K Liteé is not under any obligation of confidentiality, express or implied, with respect to the feedback (iii) K Liteé may have something similar to the feedback already under consideration or in development; and (iv) You are not entitled to any compensation or reimbursement of any kind from K Liteé for the feedback under any circumstances.

Privacy Policy

Last Update: 14 October 2018

Varenia CIMS Pvt. Ltd., operator of K Liteé, is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. 

This page discloses the privacy practices of the K Liteé mobile application and website. If you arrived at this page via one of our cobranded partner sites, please be assured that the privacy policy that you see here is in effect for all K Liteé panel members regardless of how they are directed to our registration form. 


Information We Collect

 

The Application collects the following information:

 

Information You Provide:

  • Personal information you provide prior to and during the registration process and from time to time thereafter, including name, mailing address, primary email address, and mobile phone number;
  • Other information you provide during the registration process such as your company, title, gender, and mobile device registration information;
  • Response to questions in the survey/contest.
  • Images, videos, audio and other data you purposely send us through the Application (e.g., images of products and the bar codes of such products, etc.).
  • Occasionally some of you might be requested to participate in a survey/contest where your interview will be live streamed to our clients. We will inform you over email, app or a call in case you are selected for such a survey/contest. You can choose to be a part of that survey/contest or not, the decision is entirely up to you.

Device Activity:

  • Occasionally we might also capture Application usage activity. This is as some of our surveys/contests are based on your usage of certain applications, for example, we might send you a survey/contest if you use a movie booking application on your phone.

Location:

  • Occasionally we might also capture location of your phone to verify or crosscheck the center from where the responses are being filled for the survey/contest. Sometimes, some of our surveys/contests are location based, for example, when you are in the vicinity of a petrol pump. In these cases, we will send you a survey/contest for you to participate if you visited that petrol pump.

Device or System Data:

  • Standard technical information about your device, system, network, and application software, e.g., unique device identifier, device model, operating system, language set, browser type and version, the date and time of your visit, and IP address.

 

Our Privacy Pledge
When you participate as a panel member, we want you to be aware of our privacy practices:

  • Except as described in this privacy policy, we will not make any personal identifying information of our panel members available to anyone without your knowledge (as described in this policy), except in the rare instances required by law. This includes your name, postal service address, phone number, and email address.
  • We will never try to sell you anything - that is not our business. We will never sell your name to anyone else who might want to use your name to directly sell you anything.
  • Occasionally, we may contact you to validate responses. We will never misrepresent ourselves or what we are doing.
  • Your individual responses to surveys/contests will also be kept confidential and will never be linked to your personal identifying information.
  • Your decisions about participating in a study, responding to specific questions, or discontinuing participation will be respected without question.

 

How Information Is Used:
The Information We Collect and How We Use It

When you register as a panel member, we collect the following personal identifying information: your name, postal service address, email address, and phone number.

We use your name and email address to let you know about opportunities to take surveys/contests, to provide new updates about K Liteé that may be of interest to our panellists and to inform you about special programs and benefits we are offering to our panel members (such as special gifts or incentives). Generally, panel members are notified about an opportunity to take a survey/contest several times per month. We also send brief emails to our interactive panel members several times a year to provide information of interest and to express our appreciation for their participation.

We use postal service addresses to mail free gifts offered to panel members, products to test, and/or merchandise that you redeem with your Reward Points. Products to test and cash redemptions may be mailed directly to panel members by the K Liteé team and thus do not require sharing of your name and address with outside parties. However, your name, postal service address and email address may also be shared with K Liteé reward suppliers when you redeem your Rewards. Points so they can ship to you directly. Occasionally, we ask our interactive panel members if they would be willing to take certain special paper and pencil surveys/contests. We ask your permission prior to mailing such surveys/contests or sending our representative to your address with prior appointment, as well as providing information about the benefits of taking such a survey/contest. 

We call panel members in response to their request for a return call to answer a question or address any concerns. We also call panel members for answering some surveys/contests which need quick responses or need detailed interaction which cannot be done through our app or website only. On rare occasions, we call panelists to validate survey/contest responses. 

K Liteé frequently asks panel members for demographic information (e.g., age, gender, household composition, etc.), computer and web access capabilities, and lifestyle information (e.g., types of vehicles owned or business/recreational travel, etc.). K Liteé uses this information to select surveys/contests that are appropriate for the panel member (or a member of the panelists household). For example, a survey/contest related to satisfaction with stays at various hotel chains might be sent only to those panelists who indicate a certain frequency of travel. We sometimes use birth date information to send birthday greetings to our panel members.

K Liteé asks panel members for their opinions about a variety of products and services by asking them to complete surveys/contests via the K Liteé app or website or over a call. Usually, K Liteé combines the individual panelist responses and reports on the aggregated (or group) results. Individual level responses are occasionally used, but in general not associated with any personal identifying information without your explicit consent. 

K Liteé may occasionally ask for personal identifying information as part of a specific survey/contest . In these cases, we will provide an explanation in the survey/contest introduction to allow panel members to make an informed decision about participation. The explanation will include a description of any new personal identifying information that will be collected via the survey/contest and with whom it will be shared. As with any survey/contest , members can decline to take the survey/contest or stop at any time during the survey/contest process. Like all other information we collect, any personal identifying information collected for a specific survey/contest will be used for research purposes only.


K Liteé also automatically collects information via log files to administer the app and the site and to aid in technical problem solving. Log file information collected is IP address, time a page was viewed, name of pages viewed within the K Liteé site during the specific visit, browser type, URL parameters, and cookies that were set by the K Liteé website at the time of the visit. Log files may also include information indicating where a visitor came from. This information is used only to administer the site and to identify and resolve any technical problems related to the site's operation.

When you participate in the Refer-a-Friend Program we ask for your friend's first name and email address. The first name is used in the greeting to personalize the message and the email address is needed to deliver it to your friend. Both pieces of information are only stored long enough to make sure the email was sent without difficulty and never used for any other purpose. Participation in the referral program, like all aspects of K Liteé membership, is completely voluntary.

This app and the website has security measures in place to protect the loss, misuse, and alteration of the information under our control. Panel member names, postal service addresses, and phone numbers are maintained on a secured database accessible only by Varenia CIMS staff. Panel members may also access their own information for the purposes of verifying and updating, but they cannot view other members' information. As with any Internet endeavor, absolute security of information transmitted through channels (communication networks, hardware, software) not directly operated or controlled by us cannot be guaranteed.

In the event we or our affiliates experience a merger, acquisition, sale or other transaction pursuant to which this website is acquired by a third party or another affiliate, your personal identifying information may be disclosed to the third party or affiliate both before and after the transaction, for the sole purpose of facilitating and effecting that transaction. In the event a transaction is consummated, you will be notified of the transaction via email and/or through a notice on our app or website, and custody of your personal identifying information will be transferred subject to all the terms and restrictions in this privacy policy.

Updating Your Personal Information:
Policies on Correcting/Updating Personal Identifying Information

K Liteé relies on panel members themselves to provide any updates to personal identifying information. Members may update email addresses, password, postal service address, phone number as well as name of the person who initially registered by going to the Update Your Info section of this website (available to members only). Please ensure that you change your password regularly to optimize the security of your account. For changes to any other personal identifying information, including email address, panel members are asked to edit information in the my profile page of the K Liteé app or website. K Liteé may also exchange information with our partner sites for the member's benefit and with the member's knowledge (in accordance with this privacy policy). These benefits include opportunities to earn additional rewards on the partner site and/or to eliminate K Liteé advertising to those who are already K Liteé members. The information exchanged will be the member ID and/or email address (the minimum information needed to provide the benefit). We require our partner sites sign a written, legally binding agreement stipulating they will not share your individual identifying information and that it is to be used solely for the purpose of providing you with additional rewards and to eliminate redundant advertising. 

Opt-Out Policy:
Your Decision Not To Participate

Panel members may decline to respond to a survey/contest or opt to drop interactive panel membership at any time. Panelists who prefer not to complete a given survey/contest need not do so.

Panelists who would like to withdraw their membership from the panel may do so at any time on the K Liteé app or Site. Panelists may withdraw membership by clicking on the unsubscribe link found at the bottom of the My Profile page in the member area of the K Liteé site or uninstalling the K Liteé mobile app. We will process all unsubscribe requests within 10 business days of receipt and usually within 48 hours of receipt.

Upon receipt of the drop request, K Liteé may ask you to complete brief survey/contest about the reason(s) for discontinuing membership. This survey/contest is optional and does not involve any additional email; any results will help us improve panel members' experience. Thereafter, K Liteé will stop sending survey/contest notifications.

Notification Of Changes:
How We Notify You About Changes to Our Privacy Policy

If we are going to use your personal identifying information in a manner different from that stated in our privacy policy at the time of collection, we will notify you via email or call. You will have a choice as to whether or not we use your information in this different manner; instructions for how to make that choice will be included in the email. If we make any material changes to our privacy practices that do not affect user information already stored in our database, we will post a prominent notice on our website notifying our members that there is a change and pointing them to the revised privacy page.

Privacy Policies Used In 3rd Party surveys/contests

We conduct studies with partner companies on the partner's website, which may operate under a different privacy policy. Like all our other studies, participation in these studies is completely voluntary and informed. We notify select members about these research opportunities and provide a complete description of what is involved and any member benefits. In all these cases, we will explicitly state if the privacy policy in operation for the study is the K Liteé privacy policy or a different policy. As necessary, we will provide a link to the partner's privacy policy or to the policy pertaining to the particular study. This information will be available at the beginning of the survey/contest and consent will be asked from panel members.

Updates to this Privacy Notice

We reserve the right to update and make changes to this privacy policy. If we materially change our practices in handling personally identifiable information, as described in this statement, we will notify you by sending a message to the most recent email address you provided to us. If you do not want your information used in the new way, you should notify K Liteé of your intent to cancel participation and follow the instructions K Liteé will subsequently send you for manual removal of the Application. Your continued participation in the survey/contest after the effective date of any changes constitutes your acceptance of all of the changes.
